resources.string: Multi-client for the Bitwarden® platform and KeePass (KDBX), designed to provide the best user experience possible.
Can be used with any Bitwarden® installation. This product is not associated with the Bitwarden project nor Bitwarden, Inc. Bitwarden® is a registered trademark of Bitwarden Inc.
Beautiful Interface: a rich, responsive Material You UI with Light/Dark themes.
Advanced Search: Powerful and fast search capabilities.
Watchtower: Detects pwned passwords, vulnerable accounts, reused passwords, inactive two-factor authentication, insecure websites, duplicate or expiring items and more.
Multi-Account Support: Simultaneously have multiple accounts signed in.
Offline Management: Add items and sends, modify, and view your vault offline.
Data Export: Export individual or organization items, including attachments.
Generator: Create passwords, SSH keys and email forwarders, with support for custom wordlists.
Advanced Features: Support for shortcuts, Field placeholders, URL overrides, and smart conflict resolution.
